items.title: GOP Rep. Chip Roy, at times a party thorn, to run for Texas attorney general
items.description: A member of the ultraconservative Freedom Caucus, Roy joins a crowded field vying to replace Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton.

items.title: James Dobson, evangelical leader behind Focus on the Family, dies at 89

items.title: Trump demands release of Colorado official sentenced in election data scheme
items.description: Former Mesa County clerk Tina Peters is serving a nine-year prison sentence on charges that include conspiracy to commit criminal impersonation.

items.title: Texas state House passes new election map favored by Trump
items.description: The Republican-controlled chamber will gavel back into session Wednesday with an intent to vote on a plan to help the GOP in the midterms.
